org.forgerock.openam.uma.extensions

Interface PermissionRequestFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<PermissionRequestFilter>

    public interface PermissionRequestFilter
extends Comparable<PermissionRequestFilter>
    Extension filter that will be called before permission request creation.

    Implementations of this interface can use the Guice setter based injection.

    Since:
    13.0.0

      • onPermissionRequest

        void onPermissionRequest(ResourceSetDescription resourceSetDescription,
                         Set<String> requestedScopes,
                         String requestingClientId)
        Invoked before a permission request is created.
        Parameters:
        resourceSetDescription - The resource set.
        requestedScopes - The requested scopes.
        requestingClientId - The requesting client id.
